tool_description: Lisbon BridgeCam Stream" API offers live, high-quality traffic camera feeds from Lisbon's bridges, providing real-time traffic insights for commuters and professionals. Easy integration, multiple views, and historical data make it a vital tool for navigating and analyzing Lisbon's traffic.
name: Lisbon BridgeCam Stream
title: Lisbon BridgeCam Stream

api_list.name: Latest Image
api_list.description: Get's the latest image form either of the Lisbon bridges.

required_parameters.name: bridge
required_parameters.description:
The name of the bridge to be queried.

From Vasco da Gama bridge: bridge=VSC
From April 25th bridge: bridge=APR

required_parameters.name: direction
required_parameters.description:
Trafic direction

SN: South-North
NS: North-South

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lisbon-bridgecam-stream.p.rapidapi.com/VSC/SN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lisbon-bridgecam-stream.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lisbon-bridgecam-stream.p.rapidapi.com/{bridge}/{direction}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lisbon-bridgecam-stream.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
